metadata.title: CVE-2016-0818 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The caching functionality in the TrustManagerImpl class inTrustManagerImpl.java in Conscrypt in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.x before5.1.1 LMY49H, and 6.x before 2016-03-01 mishandles the distinction betweenan intermediate CA and a trusted root CA, which allows man-in-the-middleattackers to spoof servers by leveraging access to an intermediate CA toissue a certificate, aka internal bug 26232830.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
